statements: SELECT * FROM artist_contracts;
SELECT artist_name, performance_fee FROM artist_contracts ORDER BY performance_fee DESC;
SELECT * FROM artist_contracts WHERE contract_date > '2021-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT artist_name, MAX(performance_fee) AS max_fee FROM artist_contracts GROUP BY artist_name;
SELECT artist_name, contract_date, scheduling_details FROM artist_contracts ORDER BY contract_date ASC, artist_name DESC;
SELECT artist_name, performance_fee FROM artist_contracts WHERE contract_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT artist_id, artist_name, scheduling_details FROM artist_contracts WHERE performance_fee < 1000 ORDER BY artist_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM artist_contracts WHERE performance_fee > 5000 ORDER BY contract_date DESC;
SELECT artist_name, scheduling_details FROM artist_contracts WHERE artist_id = 3 AND contract_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT artist_name, performance_fee FROM artist_contracts WHERE scheduling_details LIKE '%Virtual%' ORDER BY performance_fee ASC;
SELECT * FROM artist_contracts;
SELECT artist_name, performance_fee FROM artist_contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM artist_contracts WHERE performance_fee > 1000;
SELECT artist_name, schedule_date FROM artist_contracts ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT artist_name, location FROM artist_contracts JOIN artist_schedule ON artist_contracts.contract_id = artist_schedule.artist_id;
SELECT * FROM artist_contracts WHERE artist_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT contract_id, artist_name, performance_fee FROM artist_contracts WHERE performance_fee > 1000;
SELECT * FROM artist_schedule WHERE start_time BETWEEN '12:00:00' AND '18:00:00';
SELECT artist_name, schedule_date FROM artist_contracts WHERE schedule_date <= '2023-01-01';
SELECT schedule_id, artist_id, location FROM artist_schedule ORDER BY schedule_date DESC, start_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ArtistContracts;
SELECT artist_name, performance_fee FROM ArtistContracts WHERE agreement_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT festival_name, start_date, end_date FROM FestivalDetails ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT contract_id, performance_date, venue_name, start_time, end_time FROM SchedulingDetails WHERE performance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM ArtistContracts WHERE artist_name = 'John Doe' AND performance_fee >= 1000;
SELECT * FROM ArtistContracts WHERE artist_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT contract_id, artist_name, performance_fee FROM ArtistContracts WHERE agreement_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT festival_name, start_date, end_date FROM FestivalDetails WHERE festival_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM SchedulingDetails WHERE venue_name LIKE '%Center%';
SELECT contract_id, performance_date, venue_name FROM SchedulingDetails WHERE start_time < '12:00' ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Artist;
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM Artist WHERE genre = 'Rock';
SELECT artist_name, contract_start_date FROM Artist ORDER BY contract_start_date DESC;
SELECT venue_name, performance_date, performance_time FROM Performance WHERE venue_name = 'Madison Square Garden';
SELECT fee_amount, payment_status FROM PerformanceFee WHERE payment_status = 'Pending';
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM Artist ORDER BY genre, artist_name DESC;
SELECT venue_name, performance_date, performance_time FROM Performance WHERE performance_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY performance_date ASC, performance_time DESC;

SELECT artist_name, performance_date, venue_name, fee_amount FROM Artist INNER JOIN Performance ON Artist.artist_id = Performance.artist_id INNER JOIN PerformanceFee ON Performance.performance_id = PerformanceFee.performance_id ORDER BY performance_date DESC, fee_amount ASC;
SELECT artist_name, genre, performance_time FROM Artist INNER JOIN Performance ON Artist.artist_id = Performance.artist_id WHERE genre IN ('Pop', 'Rock') ORDER BY genre DESC, artist_name ASC;
SELECT stage_number, start_time, end_time FROM Schedule WHERE start_time >= '14:00:00' AND end_time <= '21:00:00' ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Artist;
SELECT artist_name, agency_name FROM Artist WHERE agency_name = 'XYZ Agency';
SELECT performance_date, venue_name, fee FROM Performance WHERE fee > 1000 ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT artist_name, performance_date, venue_name FROM Artist JOIN Performance ON Artist.artist_id = Performance.artist_id WHERE artist_name LIKE 'John%' AND venue_name = 'Concert Hall';
SELECT festival_id, festival_name, start_date, end_date FROM Festival WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Artist;
SELECT artist_name, agency_name FROM Artist WHERE agency_name = 'XYZ Agency';
SELECT * FROM Performance ORDER BY performance_date DESC, fee ASC;

SELECT a.artist_name, p.venue_name, f.festival_name FROM Artist a JOIN Performance p ON a.artist_id = p.artist_id JOIN Booking b ON p.performance_id = b.performance_id JOIN Festival f ON b.festival_id = f.festival_id;

SELECT a.artist_name, p.performance_date, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM Artist a JOIN Performance p ON a.artist_id = p.artist_id JOIN Schedule s ON p.performance_id = s.performance_id WHERE p.performance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
